Posts.Title: Just told I have breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you all. My appointment is Tuesday. I will let you know what happens. If it did not spread to the nodes does that mean it didnt spread anywhere else or does that not matter?
Posts.Title: Just told I have breast cancer.

Posts.Content: I recently felt a lump in my right breast. I went to the gyno and he thought it was a cyst. I got a mammo and then a ultrasound. The radiologist came in and said there is a 2cm suspicious mass and it needs a biopsy but she said she wanted to prepare me because it was going to come back as cancer. She said it is very deep and cant tell if it is hitting the muscle. I am currently waiting for an apt to get a biopsy. I normally have a mammo every year but last year I did not because of other family issues. I'm so scared it spread. Are there any ways to tell if it spread? I know I have to wait but it is driving me crazy. I cant even tell my mom because she is going through chemo for lung cancer and this would devastate her.
Posts.Title: Just told I have breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for the information. You all are the greatest group of girls and I appreciate it.
Posts.Title: Just told I have breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you ladies. You all are wonderful and make me feel better by reading your posts.
Posts.Title: Just told I have breast cancer.

Posts.Content: Thank you. I had the biopsy on Wednesday. She did the ultrasound under my arm also and only saw a small lymph node. I have an apt w the surgeon on thes at 9am to get the results. I'm so nervous because I'm scared it spread
Posts.Title: Just told I have breast cancer.
